nodes.name: The Pilgrimage of Kogobal - A Tribunal Temple Pilgrimage to Solstheim
nodes.summary: Embark on a pilgrimage to the holy Tribunal Temple site of Kogobal on Solstheim, and restore the weapon of a saint to its rightful resting place. An entry in Winter Modjam 2025: 'Pre-existing characters' 'Solstheim' and 'Tribunal Temple

nodes.name: Birthsigns RESPECted - A Birthsign Rebalance Mod
nodes.summary: This mod tweaks birthsign bonuses and adds detriments to make lackluster signs more appealing and add interesting gameplay consequences to birthsign choice.

nodes.name: There are Alternatives to Graverobbing - Fish for Mentor's Ring--Ring of Phynaster--Denstagmer's Ring
nodes.summary: Provides an alternative to graverobbing for the player to obtain the Mentor's Ring, the Ring of Phynaster, and Denstagmer's Ring by fishing using Merlord's Ultimate Fishing mod.

nodes.name: Races RESPECted - A Race Skill and Attribute Rebalance Mod
nodes.summary: This mod tweaks racial attributes, skill bonuses, and abilities to make the races' unique identities as described in lore and through their vanilla bonuses clearer and better translate them into gameplay. Thanks to the power of MWSE Lua,

nodes.name: An Abandoned Shack Rebuilt
nodes.summary: Rebuilds the Abandoned Shack near Gnaar Mok into a double width shack, with a small second story sleeping area and balcony overlooking the water. Additional details are added to flesh out the story of the shack's previous occupant.

nodes.name: MORROWIND Nerevarine - Survivor
nodes.summary: Excited to play STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor? Can't because the PC port caused your computer to burst into flames? Come to Morrowind to soothe your wounded spirit and third-degree electrical burns? Then this is the mod for you!

nodes.name: Goldbrand Reforged - The Quest for Eltonbrand
nodes.summary: Brave the dangers of Vvardenfell in this lore-friendly quest mod to reforge Goldbrand into the mysterious Eltonbrand. Speak to Sirilonwe in the Vivec Mages Guild while carrying Goldbrand to begin the quest. Part of the 2023 Winter Modjam.

nodes.name: Love and Crime A Fargoth Story
nodes.summary: Earn the keys to your new favorite friend Fargoth's heart and hearth, and discover a secret which will test the fabric of your relationship.

nodes.name: Manmeri Physique - A Breton Body Mod
nodes.summary: Alters the Breton body model to better reflect their elven heritage.

nodes.name: Polearms RESPECted - Spears Halberds Glaives and More
nodes.summary: Improves variety and versatility of the spear skill by altering the stats of spears to reflect the type of polearm their model appears to be.

nodes.name: Decomposition of a Taxman
nodes.summary: Causes the body of Seyda Neen's lost taxman, Processus Vitellius, to decompose from a fresh corpse at the beginning of the game to a skeleton after a few days and cleans up the body when his murder is reported to the authorities.

nodes.name: Vulpes Cosades
nodes.summary: Turns Caius into the asshole with a dog on his head that he was always meant to be.

nodes.name: Dagoth Dream Wave
nodes.summary: Have you ever wanted to experience the true, unadulterated aural and visual majesty of Lord Dagoth's dream sendings? Thanks to the latest in tonal architecture, now you can!

nodes.name: Flip a Coin
nodes.summary: If your heart is wavering... flip a coin, and let fate decide!

nodes.name: Properly Fitted Female Pants
nodes.summary: Are you tired of all the women in Morrowind having mysterious 'packages' in their pants? Then I have the mod for you!ï»¿ This mod adds female variants to all the pants in vanilla Morrowind by recombining the assets from the vanilla game.

nodes.name: Thrown Projectiles Revamped
nodes.summary: Using MWSE, this mod corrects an oversight which causes thrown projectiles to inflict twice their listed damage.

nodes.name: An Abandoned Shack Expansion
nodes.summary: A simple expansion of the vanilla cell 'An Abandoned Shack' southwest of Gnaar Mok, with particular focus on preserving the vanilla aesthetic and atmosphere of the original house.
